title: Dear Riot - on Jungler items;
body:
Can you please put a little say Bami's Cinder icon etc on the Relevant Upgrades to Jungle items to make it clearer which is which so I can upgrade them without having to mouse-over and find the Relevant Jungler item Upgrade?

I think it would be a nice addition. (I should know the order by now I know but I still double check) [ I know being able to upgrade faster isn't hugely important it just feels better to be in lane faster]

Also in Item sets it doesn't show you the stats of the Runeglaive enchant (I was just going to double check to see whether its a worthy buy on Jungle Akali but it doesn't show the stats of what damage it deals in aoe, only the Jungler gold bonus and regen effect.)

Also, do you think we'll ever see Energy items? I understand they'd probably be hard to balance but is there any chance we'd ever have Champion specific itemization for Energy Champions IE in the jungle or otherwise or would it be a consistent nightmare to balance?
I've used Energy Runes before and found them rewarding for certain playstyles and builds but find I miss out on a lot of stats taking them and they're a bit hit or miss and because I use such a big variety of runes it isn't really an option for me to play all the Champions I do if I have a multitude of pages dedicated to having energy runes for specific match-ups (The builds I go with them are very specific to matchups and I'd need a lot of pages with different setups and that'd be purely for Akali and wouldn't translate to other Champions so its a big investment - rune page wise.

Do you also think we'll ever receive an addition to the number of rune pages we can have? I think it would be awesome but I don't know what Riot's stance is on this.

replies.body: The pictures for each jungle enchantment are all different, the colour of the gem changes. Green for Bami, Red for warrior, purple for Devourer and Blue for Runeglaive.
Yeah lol didn't notice aye, just sorta missed it between jungling and thinking to myself I wish there was an indicator lololololl.
It's the green enchant, how hard is that?
Just noticed they have tiny little colored crystals.
Also, thanks for the Runeglaive - it's a wicked item (I play Jungle Diana now) and Cinderhulk too (Love it for Shyvana and Sejuani).
